review.title: “A nice "family" feel to working here”
review.pros: Pros – Good technical and product training - they expect you to know your store and the product range, but give you opportunities to learn about them. Management style was friendly and approachable. A lot of team spirit in the store I worked, which made it feel good to come to work. Salaries comparable to others in this market.
review.cons: Cons – Shift pattern can be an issue to work/life balance depending on the department worked; in one department my hours were changed every week, and so it was difficult to plan ahead more than a week at a time
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep on treating your staff like people, and you will keep on getting good results form them.
